name: Grow (itch) (FigyTuna, nicoleperson)
description:
Start by going into your inventory and planting a flower. Use fertilizer to help plants grow faster. When your flower starts to sparkle, tap on it three times in a row to harvest essence and seeds. Use essence on budding plants to discover new plants!

Try to discover all 27 kinds of plants.

Tips: You can press and hold a plant to remove it to make room for more plants. Try combining lots of one item together to make fertilizer or unlock more space to plant things.

Download for Android for the best experience. Also available for Linux, Mac, Windows, and in browser.

(NOTE: Saving may not work in the browser version!)

Game and music by: Ryan

Art and sound effects by: Nicole

Font: Connection Bold (OFL)

Source: GitHub (License: GPL3)
